resources.string: 志達科技有限公司\nCYCON TECHNOLOGY LIMITED

1。本程式所載的內容資料均由第三者, 四者或機構所提供，僅供參考之用。用者應自行判斷內容之真實性。 
2.本程式將盡力確保該等資料的準確，若發現本程式所載列的內容出現問題，請聯絡我們。本程式具有自行處理（刪除或保留）所有內容的權利，且將不作另行通知。
3．由於最近通貨彭脹急劇, 部分餐單價目經常有所調整。 用家請自行查詢最新價目。
4．本程式不會負責因資料錯誤而導致之任何損失。

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CAFEENTRIES( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT , phone TEXT , district TEXT , address TEXT , website TEXT , coordx TEXT , coordy TEXT , openhours TEXT , description TEXT , message TEXT , type0 TEXT , type1 TEXT , type2 TEXT , option_phoneorder TEXT , option_booking TEXT , option_night TEXT , option_call TEXT , option_buffet TEXT , option_banquet TEXT , menuid TEXT , introid TEXT , intropage TEXT , recommendid TEXT , recommendpage TEXT , menupage TEXT , payment TEXT , status TEXT , option_wifi TEXT , option_parking TEXT , branch TEXT , priority TEXT )

INSERT INTO CAFEENTRIES( id, name, phone, district, address, website, coordx, coordy, openhours, description, message, type0, type1, type2, option_phoneorder, option_booking, option_night, option_call, option_buffet, option_banquet, menuid, introid, intropage, recommendid, recommendpage, menupage, payment, status, option_wifi, option_parking, branch, priority) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?, ?)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS WATCHLISTENTRIES( EntryId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, Symbol TEXT NOT NULL, TypeCode TEXT)
INSERT INTO WATCHLISTENTRIES( Symbol, TypeCode) VALUES(?,?)
SELECT EntryId, Symbol, TypeCode FROM WATCHLISTENTRIES WHERE Symbol = ? ORDER BY EntryId DESC
SELECT EntryId, Symbol, TypeCode FROM WATCHLISTENTRIES
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RECENT_QUOTES( RecentQuoteId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, Symbol TEXT NOT NULL, TypeCode TEXT NOT NULL, ExchangeCode TEXT, ExchangeGroup TEXT )
INSERT INTO RECENT_QUOTES( Symbol, TypeCode, ExchangeCode, ExchangeGroup) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT RecentQuoteId, Symbol, TypeCode FROM RECENT_QUOTES ORDER BY RecentQuoteId DESC
DELETE FROM RECENT_QUOTES WHERE RecentQuoteId = ( SELECT MIN(RecentQuoteId) FROM RECENT_QUOTES)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RSS_DATASOURCE( FeedId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, Title TEXT NOT NULL, Link TEXT NOT NULL, Description TEXT, SelectedFlag INTEGER)
INSERT INTO RSS_DATASOURCE (Title, Link, Description, SelectedFlag) VALUES(?,?,?,?)
SELECT FeedId, Title, Link, Description,SelectedFlag FROM RSS_DATASOURCE ORDER BY FeedId
